solution_line_template: Her card has a ${initial_balance} balance and she makes a ${payment} payment so the new balance is {initial_balance}-{payment} = $<<{initial_balance}-{payment}={balance_after_payment}>>{balance_after_payment}
She didn't pay it off so she is charged {interest_rate_percent}% interest on her ${balance_after_payment} balance so the interest is {interest_rate_decimal}*{balance_after_payment} = $20.00

Her balance was ${balance_after_payment} and she was charged $20.00 in interest so her new balance is {balance_after_payment}+{interest} = $<<{balance_after_payment}+{interest}={new_balance}>>{new_balance}
